description: K. A. R. P. Dharmaratne Vs. Dr. C. Gunasekara And 04 others - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  When a judicial pronouncement by a Competent Court is in existence, then no writ would lie to interfere with such a decision
parties: K. A. R. P. Dharmaratne Vs. Dr. C. Gunasekara And 04 others - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
judgement_by: When a judicial pronouncement by a Competent Court is in existence, then no writ would lie to interfere with such a decision
